thread.title: Penton's SpeedNews 20th Annual Business & General Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference To Be Held in Los Angeles, October 6-7, 2015
thread.title_full: Penton's SpeedNews 20th Annual Business & General Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference To Be Held in Los Angeles, October 6-7, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Penton's SpeedNews 20th Annual Business & General Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference To Be Held in Los Angeles, October 6-7, 2015
text:
Penton
LOS ANGELES , Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The SpeedNews 20 th Annual Business & General Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference will draw aviation industry professionals to the prestigious Jonathan Club in Los Angeles on October 6-7 , 2015. This indispensible industry conference is presented by Penton's SpeedNews , the source for aviation news, information and leading aviation industry events. To register, visit http://speednews.com/business-and-general-aviation-industry-suppliers-conference/registration .
Formerly known as the Regional & Business Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference, the newly rebranded SpeedNews 20 th Annual Business & General Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference is designed for aviation equipment manufacturers, material suppliers, MRO and IT suppliers, aviation marketing and business development professionals and analysts.
Attendees will hear from experts from both business and general aircraft and engine manufacturers on the latest industry developments. "If you are interested in having a better understanding of current programs, market forecasts and deliveries, this is the Conference you won't want to miss," said Joanna Speed , Managing Director, A&D Events, Penton Aviation.
Scheduled speakers include representatives from:
Asset Insight
Bank of America â€“ Merrill Lynch Global Research
Bombardier Business Aircraft
Brian Foley Associates
Chase & Associates
CIT Aerospace
Dassault Falcon Jet
Embraer
Frost & Sullivan
General Aviation Manufacturers Association (GAMA)
Gulfstream Aerospace
ICF International
Rolland Vincent Associates
Textron Aviation
UBS
Walsh Aviation
Sponsors of the SpeedNews 20 th Annual Business & General Aviation Industry Suppliers Conference include CIRCOR Aerospace & Defense, Constellium, Verify, Greater Wichita Economic Development Coalition, Visit Wichita, CIT, Kellstrom Defense and Silvercrest by Snecma .
Information on registration and promotional opportunities for the event is available at http://speednews.com/business-and-general-aviation-industry-suppliers-conference/information or by calling +1-424-465-6501. On Twitter, follow @speednewsconf ( https://twitter.com/speednewsconf ). For information about all SpeedNews events, visit http://speednews.com/all/conference .
ABOUT PENTON'S AVIATION WEEK NETWORK
Penton's Aviation Week Network is the largest multimedia information and services provider for the global aviation, aerospace and defense industries that has a database of 1.2 million professionals around the world. Industry professionals rely on Aviation Week for analysis, marketing and intelligence. Customers include the world's leading manufacturers, suppliers, airlines, business aviation operators, militaries, governments and other organizations that serve this global market. The product portfolio includes Aviation Week & Space Technology , AC-U-KWIK, Aircraft Blue Book, Airportdata.com, Air Charter Guide, Air Transport World , AviationWeek.com, Aviation Week Intelligence Network, Business & Commercial Aviation , ShowNews , SpeedNews , Fleet and MRO forecasts, global maintenance, repair and overhaul (MRO) tradeshows and aerospace & defense conferences.
ABOUT PENTON
Penton is an innovative information services company that empowers nearly 20 million business decision makers in markets that drive more than 12 trillion dollars in purchases each year. Our products inform with rich industry insights and workflow tools; engage through dynamic events, education and networking; and advance business with powerful marketing services programs. Penton is the way smart businesses buy, sell and grow.
Headquartered in New York , Penton is privately owned by MidOcean Partners and Wasserstein & Co., LP. For more information, visit http://www.penton.com or follow us on Twitter @PentonNow.
